10 # Declaring a figure "gnt"
11 fontsize=30
12 plt.rcParams.update({'font.size': fontsize, 'axes.titlesize':fontsize})
13 plt.rc('font', size=fontsize) # controls default text sizes
14 plt.rc('axes', titlesize=fontsize) # fontsize of the axes title
15 plt.rc('axes', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the x and y labels
16 plt.rc('xtick', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the tick labels
17 plt.rc('ytick', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the tick labels
18 plt.rc('legend', fontsize=fontsize) # legend fontsize
19 plt.rc('figure', titlesize=fontsize)
20 fig, gnt = plt.subplots(figsize=[20,7])
21 plt.subplots_adjust(left=0.06, bottom=.3, right=.96, top=.95, wspace=10, hspace=0)
22

45 # Declaring multiple bars in at same level and same width
46 file = open("move_base.csv")
47 data = []
48 dur_movebase = 0
49 csvreader = csv.reader(file, delimiter=',')
50 for i in range(3):
51  next(csvreader)
52 for row in csvreader:
53  dur = float(row[2])-float(row[1])
54  data.append((float(row[1]), dur))
55  dur_movebase = dur_movebase + dur
56 file.close()
57 gnt.broken_barh(data, (10, 10), facecolors ='tab:blue')
58 
59 file = open("move_group.csv")
60 data = []
61 dur_movegroup = 0
62 csvreader = csv.reader(file, delimiter=',')
63 for i in range(3):
64  next(csvreader)
65 for row in csvreader:
66  dur = float(row[2])-float(row[1])
67  data.append((float(row[1]), dur))
68  dur_movegroup = dur_movegroup + dur
69 file.close()
70 gnt.broken_barh(data,(20,10),facecolors =([.7,0.2,0.2]))
71 
72 file = open("image_processing.csv")
73 data = []
74 dur_img = 0
75 csvreader = csv.reader(file, delimiter=',')
76 for i in range(3):
77  next(csvreader)
78 for row in csvreader:
79  dur = float(row[2])-float(row[1])
80  data.append((float(row[1]), dur))
81  dur_img = dur_img + dur
82 file.close()
83 
84 gnt.broken_barh(data, (30, 10), facecolors =('tab:orange'))
85 gnt.legend(['T1: move_base', 'T2: MoveGroup','T3: Perception'], bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.2), ncol=3,loc='upper center')
86 plt.savefig("waterfall.png",dpi=500)

89 
90 def pietext(task, duration, alldurations):
91  percent = (duration/np.sum(alldurations)*100)
92  return "{:s}\n{:.1f} s ({:.1f} %)".format(task, duration, percent)
93 
94 fontsize = 18
95 plt.rcParams.update({'font.size': fontsize, 'axes.titlesize':fontsize})
96 plt.rc('font', size=fontsize) # controls default text sizes
97 plt.rc('axes', titlesize=fontsize) # fontsize of the axes title
98 plt.rc('axes', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the x and y labels
99 plt.rc('xtick', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the tick labels
100 plt.rc('ytick', labelsize=fontsize) # fontsize of the tick labels
101 plt.rc('legend', fontsize=fontsize) # legend fontsize
102 plt.rc('figure', titlesize=fontsize)
103 
104 fig2, pie = plt.subplots(figsize=[10,6])
105 #plt.subplots_adjust(left=.1, bottom=.0, right=1, top=1, wspace=10, hspace=0)
106 durations = [dur_movebase, dur_movegroup, dur_img]
107 wedges, texts = pie.pie(durations, colors=['tab:blue', [.7,0.2,0.2], 'tab:orange'], wedgeprops=dict(width=0.5))
108 bbox_props = dict(boxstyle="square,pad=0.3", fc="w", ec="w", lw=0.72)
109 kw = dict(arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle="-"),
110  bbox=bbox_props, zorder=0, va="center")
111 tasks=['T1: move_base', 'T2: MoveGroup','T3: Perception']
112 for i, p in enumerate(wedges):
113  ang = (p.theta2 - p.theta1)/2. + p.theta1
114  y = np.sin(np.deg2rad(ang))
115  x = np.cos(np.deg2rad(ang))
116  horizontalalignment = {-1: "right", 1: "left"}[int(np.sign(x))]
117  connectionstyle = "angle,angleA=0,angleB={}".format(ang)
118  kw["arrowprops"].update({"connectionstyle": connectionstyle})
119  pie.annotate(pietext(tasks[i],durations[i],durations), xy=(x, y), xytext=(1.35*np.sign(x), 1.4*y),
120  horizontalalignment=horizontalalignment, **kw)
121 plt.savefig("pie.png",dpi=500)

134 fig, group = plt.subplots(figsize=[20,7])
135 plt.subplots_adjust(left=0.08, bottom=.35, right=.96, top=.95, wspace=10, hspace=0)
136 file = open("move_group_split.csv")
137 data = np.array([np.array([(0.0,0.0)]),np.array([(0.0,0.0)]),np.array([(0.0,0.0)]),np.array([(0.0,0.0)]),np.array([(0.0,0.0)]),np.array([(0.0,0.0)]),np.array([(0.0,0.0)])])
138 drop = []
139 grasp = []
140 scan = []
141 post = []
142 pre = []
143 validate = []
144 dur_img = 0
145 csvreader = csv.reader(file, delimiter=',')
146 for i in range(3):
147  next(csvreader)
148 for row in csvreader:
149  idx = 0
150  for k in [1,9,13,17,21,25]:
151  if(row[k]):
152  duration = float(row[k+1]) - float(row[k])
153  if(idx==0):
154  drop.append((float(row[k]), duration))
155  if(idx==1):
156  grasp.append((float(row[k]), duration))
157  if(idx==2):
158  scan.append((float(row[k]), duration))
159  if(idx==3):
160  post.append((float(row[k]), duration))
161  if(idx==4):
162  pre.append((float(row[k]), duration))
163  if(idx==5):
164  validate.append((float(row[k]), duration))
165  idx = idx+1
166 
167 file.close()
168 group.broken_barh(scan,(0,5),facecolors =[.5,0,0])
169 group.broken_barh(validate,(5,5),facecolors =[.6,0.1,0.1])
170 group.broken_barh(pre,(10,5),facecolors =[.7,0.2,0.2])
171 group.broken_barh(grasp,(15,5),facecolors =[.8,0.3,0.3])
172 group.broken_barh(post,(20,5),facecolors =[.9,0.4,0.4])
173 group.broken_barh(drop,(25,5),facecolors =[1,0.5,0.5])
174 group.grid(axis='x')
175 group.set_ylim(0, 30)
176 group.set_xlim(0,1600)
177 group.set_xlabel('Time [s]')
178 group.set_ylabel('Tasks')
179 group.set_yticks([2.5,7.5,12.5,17.5,22.5,27.5])
180 group.set_yticklabels(['T2.1','T2.2','T2.3','T2.4','T2.5','T2.6'])
181 group.legend(['T2.1: Scan', 'T2.2: Validate','T2.3: Pregrasp','T2.4: Grasp','T2.5: Postgrasp','T2.6: Drop'],loc='upper center', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, -0.2), ncol=3)
182 #group.legend(['T2.1: Scan', 'T2.2: Validate','T2.3: Pregrasp','T2.4: Grasp','T2.5: Postgrasp','T2.6: Drop'], ncol=3,loc='upper center')
183 def mapper(a):
184  return a[1]
185 print(np.array(list(map(mapper,drop))).sum())
186 plt.savefig("group.png",dpi=500)
187 groupduration = []
188 groupduration.append(np.array(list(map(mapper,scan))).sum())
189 groupduration.append(np.array(list(map(mapper,validate))).sum())
190 groupduration.append(np.array(list(map(mapper,pre))).sum())
191 groupduration.append(np.array(list(map(mapper,grasp))).sum())
192 groupduration.append(np.array(list(map(mapper,post))).sum())
193 groupduration.append(np.array(list(map(mapper,drop))).sum())

209 bbox_props = dict(boxstyle="square,pad=0.3", fc="w", ec="w", lw=0.72)
210 kw = dict(arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle="-"),
